full_summary:
### Tender Notice
#### Official Title [English]
W4M00-22C202 Line Painting
#### Official Title [French]
W4M00-22C202 Services de Traçage de Lignes

#### Tender Details

| --- | --- |
| **Amendment Number** | 0 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3568995953 |
| **Publication Date** | August 18, 2022 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | September 6, 2022 at 2:00 p.m. MDT |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | N/A |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | August 7, 2024 |
| **Tender Status** | CANCELLED (Initially, the announcement stated a standing offer framework, but later requested that submissions close on September 6, 2022.) |


#### Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit to the bid for the provision of Line Painting Services. The services under this contract include labour, tools, equipment, materials, transportation, and supervision for Line Painting Services to be carried out at various sites in Winnipeg, Manitoba. Bid submission is by September 6, 2022, with deliveries anticipated for two years, as well as up to four one-year extension options. To minimize any elevation of prebendings taxpayers funding operation.

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Phone: Not Given, bEmail) matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Procurement Details
*   *Commercial painting service*
*   *Industrial painting service*
*   *Pavement marking service*
*   The governing procurement category under this contract falls under Commercial National/Industrial Security.

#### Trade Agreements
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) / Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
